ref_text: Berri yenna-d d akken "ad yuɣal ɣer Teksas i wakken ad ssitegeɣ igemmaḍen n temlilit n ugraw n umni n yiḍ-agi, ad ɣeṭseɣ ma yella ubrid i yiman-iw deg umsizzel-agi", maca sakkin yenna-d d akken ad yeqqim deg umsizzel yerna ad yili deg tmenyugert n tazwara n 21 di Yennayer di Karulina n Unẓul.
hyp_text: Pariyen yettmeslayen ad yeqqel ɣer Teksis tamɣur aɣer wass n ucaucus n lqec, ad d-ihemmi yimɣur ad yesɣur s yiseggasen n wass, ma d-yezrin ad yeqqel deg wass n yiseggasen ma d ad yeqqel ɣer yiseggasen n Yennayer 21, cauc n Sɛul Sɛul.

src_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

hyp_text: Aɣerdayen n Tamezwarut Princeton n Tamezwarut n Iwetṭasen d Tamezwarut n Upasala n Swiden, yellan tura t-tesnaylent s yimnagren, ma d-yiwenen ɣer t-tesnaylent ad yizwi, deg-sen aɣer t-twacuṭen aɣer t-tesnaylent aɣer t-tesnaylent, aɣer t-twacuṭen n t-tesnaylent, Geospiza fortes, d t-tesnaylent n t-tesnaylent, Geospiza conirostris.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: Amur ameqqran n usmedya n temḥettemt tatiknulujit cerken snat n tektiwin timatuyin: belli anerni n tetiknulujit s timmad-is itabaɛ abrid ibaɛden s waṭas ɣef tezrirt n yidles neɣ n tsertit, yarna tatiknulujit-agi daɣen tesɛa "isemda" ɣef tmettiyin i yellan d igejdanen, mačči d wid ittucaṛḍen s wudem ametti.
hyp_text: Akk tɣaraf n teɛrɣiyen n teknulujiji, yenɣa d ɣef yiseggasen ameqqran: ayen n yidles d tɣaraf n teknulujiji yettmeslayen s yimnayen aqbur n wučal n wučal, ma d ayen n teknulujiji yettmeslayen s uɣerfan i d-yiwen, aɣerfan aɣerfan, ma d aɣerfan s wučal, ma d aɣerfan s wučal.

src_text: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

hyp_text: Akk, aɣallen-nsen s yiseggasen, yiwet-nsen yiwet-nsen, ma d ɣer 800,000 n uɣallen n Tameɣri n Uṣebbiṭ, iɣallen deg uɣallen n Tbeloruss n n Ukran, sɣur uɣallen n yilel n Pɔlɔnd, s yimzɣen s Tɣerma n Riga, Tɣerma n Tameɣri-Pɔlɔnd, nɣa Tɣerma n yiseggasen n yilel, aɣallen n yilel n wass n yilel n yilel.

src_text: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
ref_text: Tamdint tatrart n Kazablanka bnan-tt iṣeyyaden imaziɣen di lqaṛn wis 10 uqbel Lmasiḥ, umbeɛd tettwasexdem sɣuṛ Ifiniqiyen, Irumaniyen, akked Imiriniden d asagen isem-is Anfa.
hyp_text: Taswirt n tamdint tamzwarant n Kasbaṛanṛa tettwassnen imrabten n Ibelwiyen ifeṛṛanen deg tis 10 n yiseggasen BCE, ma d-yessem-d yettusem n Iphuniciyen, Iromen, d Imereniden ɣer yisemran n wuɣar Anfa.

src_text: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.

src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
ref_text: Di 1895, seld lexṣara di Trad Amenzu n Sinu-Ajabuni (1894-1895), anabaḍ Kwing yezmel Aɣan n Cimunuseki, d ayen yeǧǧan leḥkem n Taywan i Jabu, iḥekmen tigzirt alama d 1945.
hyp_text: Deg 1895, i wakal-ines deg useggas n Tafensayt n Sin-Japan (1894-1895), tamaneɣt n Qin yuɣal t-ikseb Tameṭṭut n Shimonoseki, i yirḍen ad yekseb tamaḍlant n Taṣin n Yapan, i yeqqnen yiseggasen n 1945.

hyp_text: Akk i yisemhar n yinsegwahen (yinsegwah n wass-a) ttekkan deg useggas n yinsegwahen n yiseggasen (maca yisemhar deg useggas n yinsegwahen n yiseggasen, iḥeqqeq aɣer yimeẓriyen, iḥeqqeq aɣer yirr, ma d iḥeqqeq aɣer yilel n wass-a, iɣalen ad nḥebben s tixerzayin n wass-a deg useggas n yinsegwahen n yiseggasen.

hyp_text: Aḥricen-nsen, aɣalen ad yin ɣur-nsen ad yezwi aɣalen aɣer yimeẓriyen-sen, aɣalen ad yezwi aɣalen i d-yezwi i yis-saɣen aɣer yimeẓriyen-sen, ma d yimeẓriyen-sen.
